column1: Local Foods////Love Local Foods for lots of reasons!  They have really great
column4: locally sourced food first of all.  The menu is creative and tasty.  They have fabulous baked goods too which I try to avoid because they are that good.  Aside from their great food
column6: convenient gourmet pop up market during Covid which I have loved so much.  Lastly
column7: This place is so good to our community.  It's a win-win dining here.
